cast.original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
cast.overview: After years of being sheltered from the human world, the Turtle brothers set out to win the hearts of New Yorkers and be accepted as normal teenagers through heroic acts. Their new friend April O'Neil helps them take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.
cast.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem

details.biography:
Brady Noon (born December 30, 2005) is an American actor. Noon began his career as a child actor on the television show Boardwalk Empire (2010–2013), portraying Thomas Darmody. He also starred as Evan Morrow in the Disney+ series The Mighty Ducks: Game Changers (2021–2023).

In film, he played Thor in the comedy film Good Boys (2019), followed by voice roles as Greg Heffley in Diary of a Wimpy Kid (2021) and Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules (2023) and Raphael in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem (2023). He also appeared in Marry Me (2022) and Family Switch (2023).
details.name: Brady Noon
